author: kkolinko
msg: I thought about moving ErrorHandler instance creation outside the retry loop, but actually that is not needed: looping happens only when asyncReply==false and ErrorHandler is created only when asyncReply==true. Thus it is created only once.

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1972 Don't keep the script toplevel scope as an instance field. Rather use the top call scope field of the Rhino Context

author: zoe
msg: what will this do to a release?
